extends java.util.Observable
implements java.lang.Runnable

      • getAvailableHostsOnServer

        public void getAvailableHostsOnServer(java.io.File taskFile,
                             java.util.ArrayList<java.io.File> attachFiles,
                             java.util.ArrayList<java.io.File> args,
                             java.lang.String classToExecute,
                             java.lang.String methodToExecute,
                             java.lang.String group,
                             java.util.Date schedule)
        Asks the server for a set of available hosts to execute a task.
        Parameters:
        taskFile - the task file to be executed.
        attachFiles - the attached files of the task.
        args - the argument files of task.
        classToExecute - class to be executed.
        methodToExecute - method to be executed.
        group - group to which this task results will be shared.

        Send a task to execute in any host.
        Parameters:
        hosts - a host sent by a server that is available to run tasks.
        taskID - a long representing a task ID which must unique to a server.
